medications.name: Warfarin
medications.description: An anticoagulant medication used to prevent blood clots and treat various conditions such as deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and pulmonary embolism (PE).

medications.name: Monoamine oxidase inhibitors
medications.description: Used primarily as antidepressants to treat major depressive disorder and other mood disorders by increasing levels of certain neurotransmitters in the brain.

medications.name: Methotrexate
medications.description: Used to treat certain types of cancer such as leukemia, lymphoma, and breast cancer, as well as autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis.

medications.name: Atorvastatin
medications.description: A statin medication used to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart attack, stroke, and other complications in patients with cardiovascular disease.

medications.name: Simvastatin
medications.description: A statin medication used to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of cardiovascular events.

medications.name: Acetaminophen
medications.description: A common over-the-counter pain reliever and fever reducer used to treat mild to moderate pain and fever.

medications.name: Diazepam
medications.description: A benzodiazepine medication used to treat anxiety disorders, alcohol withdrawal symptoms, muscle spasms, and seizures.

medications.name: Alprazolam
medications.description: A benzodiazepine medication primarily used to treat anxiety disorders, panic disorders, and anxiety associated with depression.

medications.name: Digoxin
medications.description: A medication used to treat heart failure and certain types of irregular heart rhythms (arrhythmias) by increasing the strength of the heart's contractions.

medications.name: Fluoxetine
medications.description: An antidepressant medication belonging to the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) class, used to treat major depressive disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), bulimia nervosa, and panic disorder.

medications.name: Sertraline
medications.description: A SSRI antidepressant used to treat depression, OCD, panic disorder, social anxiety disorder, and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

medications.name: Oral Contraceptives
medications.description: Birth control pills containing hormones that prevent ovulation and/or make it more difficult for sperm to reach the uterus, thus preventing pregnancy.

medications.name: Prednisone
medications.description: A corticosteroid medication used to suppress the immune system and reduce inflammation, used to treat a variety of conditions including autoimmune diseases, allergic reactions, and certain types of cancer.

medications.name: Dexamethasone
medications.description: A corticosteroid medication with similar uses to prednisone, also used to reduce inflammation and suppress immune responses.

medications.name: Heparin
medications.description: An anticoagulant medication used to prevent blood clots from forming or getting bigger, often used in the treatment and prevention of conditions like deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism.

medications.name: Rivaroxaban
medications.description: An anticoagulant medication used to prevent blood clots, particularly in people with atrial fibrillation, deep vein thrombosis, or pulmonary embolism.

medications.name: Lithium
medications.description: Primarily used to treat bipolar disorder (manic-depressive illness) to help control mood swings, including episodes of mania and depression.

medications.name: Tums
medications.description: An over-the-counter antacid used to relieve heartburn, indigestion, and acid reflux by neutralizing stomach acid.

medications.name: Rolaids
medications.description: A over-the-counter antacid used to relieve heartburn, acid indigestion, and upset stomach.

medications.name: Levothyroxine
medications.description: A synthetic thyroid hormone used to treat hypothyroidism (underactive thyroid) by replacing or supplementing the body's own thyroid hormone.

medications.name: Metformin
medications.description: An oral medication used to treat type 2 diabetes by lowering blood sugar levels and improving insulin sensitivity.

medications.name: Insulin
medications.description: A hormone medication used to treat diabetes by regulating blood sugar levels. It is administered via injection and is essential for people with type 1 diabetes and some with type 2 diabetes.

medications.name: Cyclosporine
medications.description: An immunosuppressant medication used to prevent organ rejection after transplantation and to treat certain autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis.

medications.name: Tacrolimus
medications.description: An immunosuppressant used to prevent organ rejection after transplantation, particularly for liver, kidney, or heart transplants.

medications.name: Ibuprofen
medications.description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever. It is commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, arthritis, menstrual cramps, and minor injuries.

medications.name: Naproxen
medications.description: A NSAID similar to ibuprofen, used for pain relief and inflammation reduction in conditions such as arthritis, menstrual cramps, and minor injuries.

medications.name: Metoprolol
medications.description: A beta-blocker medication used to treat high blood pressure, angina (chest pain), and heart failure. It may also be used to prevent migraine headaches and improve survival after a heart attack.

medications.name: Atenolol
medications.description: A beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure, angina, and heart rhythm disorders. It can also help prevent future heart attacks.

medications.name: Carbamazepine
medications.description: An anticonvulsant medication used to control seizures in epilepsy and to treat certain types of nerve pain such as trigeminal neuralgia and diabetic neuropathy.

medications.name: Phenytoin
medications.description: An anticonvulsant used to control seizures in epilepsy and to prevent and treat seizures during or after brain surgery.

medications.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
medications.description: A diuretic medication used to treat high blood pressure and edema (fluid retention) by increasing urine production and reducing excess fluid in the body.

medications.name: Furosemide
medications.description: A diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and edema by increasing urine output and reducing excess fluid accumulation in the body.

medications.name: Risperidone
medications.description: An antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and irritability associated with autism. It helps to stabilize mood and reduce hallucinations and delusions.

medications.name: Quetiapine
medications.description: An antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and major depressive disorder. It also helps with mood stabilization and reducing hallucinations and delusions.

medications.name: Aspirin
medications.description: An NSAID medication used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever. It is also used in low doses as a blood thinner to prevent heart attacks and strokes.

medications.name: Clopidogrel
medications.description: An antiplatelet medication used to prevent blood clots in people with heart disease, peripheral artery disease, and after certain heart procedures like stent placement.

medications.name: Lisinopril
medications.description: An ACE inhibitor medication used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to improve survival after heart attacks.

medications.name: Amlodipine
medications.description: A calcium channel blocker medication used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina) by relaxing blood vessels and improving blood flow.

medications.name: Fluconazole
medications.description: An antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections such as vaginal yeast infections, oral thrush, and systemic fungal infections.

medications.name: Ketoconazole
medications.description: An antifungal used to treat various fungal infections including athlete's foot, ringworm, and yeast infections of the skin or nails.

medications.name: Enalapril
medications.description: An ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to improve survival after heart attacks.

medications.name: Lisinopril
medications.description: An ACE inhibitor medication used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to improve survival after heart attacks.

medications.name: Apixaban
medications.description: An anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots in people with atrial fibrillation, deep vein thrombosis, and pulmonary embolism.

medications.name: Dabigatran
medications.description: An anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots in people with atrial fibrillation and to prevent deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism after hip or knee replacement surgery.

medications.name: Amitriptyline
medications.description: A tricyclic antidepressant used to treat depression, neuropathic pain, and certain anxiety disorders.

medications.name: Nortriptyline
medications.description: A tricyclic antidepressant used to treat depression, neuropathic pain, and certain anxiety disorders.

medications.name: Oxycodone
medications.description: An opioid analgesic used to treat moderate to severe pain. It is a controlled substance due to its potential for addiction and dependence.

medications.name: Hydrocodone
medications.description: An opioid analgesic used to relieve moderate to severe pain. Like oxycodone, it is a controlled substance with potential for addiction.

medications.name: Amiodarone
medications.description: An antiarrhythmic medication used to treat and prevent certain types of irregular heart rhythms (arrhythmias), particularly ventricular arrhythmias.

medications.name: Flecainide
medications.description: An antiarrhythmic medication used to treat and prevent various types of arrhythmias, including atrial fibrillation and ventricular tachycardia.

medications.name: Alendronate
medications.description: A bisphosphonate medication used to treat osteoporosis and prevent fractures by slowing down bone loss and increasing bone density.

medications.name: Risedronate
medications.description: A bisphosphonate used for the same purposes as alendronate, to treat osteoporosis and prevent fractures.

medications.name: Oseltamivir
medications.description: An antiviral medication used to treat and prevent influenza (flu) by inhibiting the replication of the influenza virus.

medications.name: Acyclovir
medications.description: An antiviral medication used to treat herpes simplex infections (including genital herpes) and varicella-zoster (shingles) infections.

medications.name: Infliximab
medications.description: A tumor necrosis factor (TNF) inhibitor medication used to treat autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, Crohn's disease, and psoriasis.

medications.name: Adalimumab
medications.description: A TNF inhibitor used to treat autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, Crohn's disease, and ulcerative colitis.
